description.brief: Stack containing the SENEKA project specific ROS packages of Fraunhofer IPA.

stack.description: This stack contains several packages that are built specifically for the Sensor-Nodes developed at Fraunhofer IPA for the SENEKA project. These packages might work with other hardware and can be used for other purposes, however the development has been specifically for this project and the developed sensor nodes.
stack.author: Maintained by Florian Mirus and Matthias Gruhler
